pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9] Enabling dynamic linking for Windows build

content.raw:
the CI results look better now; thanks for all the fixes

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1659)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1659/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1659/

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=780)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/780/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/780/
